projects.title: Continuous Authentication using Behavioral Biometrics via a Transformer Based Deep Learning Model
projects.shortDescription: Research Project which addresses the critical gap of multi-user continuous authentication.
projects.detailedDescription: Developed and trained a Transformer-based deep learning model for continuous user authentication on smart devices using behavioral biometrics (touch dynamics, typing patterns, and gait analysis). The research addressed the critical gap of multi-user continuous authentication, enabling multiple authorized users on a single device. The model achieved an Equal Error Rate (EER) of 1.91% with a 2-second window, leveraging Out-of-Distribution (OOD) detection techniques to eliminate the need for imposter datasets.

projects.title: Bookkeeping Platform

projects.title: Ecommerce Client
projects.shortDescription: An eCommerce web client built using modern frontend technologies, integrating seamlessly with a public FreeAPI
projects.detailedDescription: A full-featured eCommerce web client built using React 18, Vite, Tailwind CSS, and Redux Toolkit, consuming a public FreeAPI. The app supports user authentication via email and Google SSO, multilingual and RTL language support, product browsing, cart management, coupon application, PayPal payments, and complete order tracking. It includes a admin dashboard for managing categories, products, coupons, and orders using AG Grid. The application leverages Axios for API communication, React Hook Form for robust form handling, and i18n for localization, providing a responsive, secure, and user-friendly interface.
